pages.text: $(bold)Wall Run$() is a technique to jump vertically using a wall, to get over it.$(br)Don't mistake this for $(l:actions/horizontal_wall_run)Horizontal Wall Run$().$(br)$(br)Please note that you fail wall running if the wall is made of slippery material like ice block.

pages.title: How to Use
pages.text: $(bold)1.$() Look above horizontal line and take running up with $(l:parcool:actions/fast_run)Fast Run$()$(br)$(bold)2.$() Jump onto wall with not releasing jump key.$(br)$(br)It may be little difficult but try it.
